Posts.Content: Laura666 wrote: hey gals, Does anybody know if radiation is not recommended for people with a gene mutation because it could damage the dna even further? I am waiting on the breast cancer diagnosis but it's 95% certain i have it based on mammos, US and MRI. Looks like DCIS but am waiting for the biopsy to tell me that it's not worse. I would love to keep my breasts but from everything i read, looks like mastectomy would be better for me because of the gene mutation i have which is called CHEK 2. And just fyi, i already had thyroid and colorectal cancer , all before 39! So this breast thing is another blow, so soon after the colorectal one.
